MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA8 postcode area of Widnes, affecting properties in New Bank Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:11PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive repairs to an underground cable fault. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 03:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:08PM on 21st February 2021.
